bibl.title: A case of Ptolemaic quid pro quo from the Phaies archive
bibl.note: P. London Univ. College Inv. 31916. Ptolemaic hypomnema belonging to the archive of the oikonomos Phaies (late III BC) and coming from cartonnage unearthed by W.M.F. Petrie at Gurob. The text seems to be a semi-formal request to join the ἐφοδεία, an office subordinate to the οἰκονόμος.
bibl.seg: Lincoln H. Blumell & Chiara Aliberti, A Case of Ptolemaic Quid Pro Quo from the Phaies Archive.

P. London Univ. College Inv. 31916. Ptolemaic hypomnema belonging to the archive of the oikonomos Phaies (late III BC) and coming from cartonnage unearthed by W.M.F. Petrie at Gurob. The text seems to be a semi-formal request to join the ἐφοδεία, an office subordinate to the οἰκονόμος.
